'''''The Day of Tirgan''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to talk to [[Sorush]] after protecting the Flower of Sanctity during ''[[The Hymn of Tir Yazad (Part 2)]]''.
==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*{{lang|{{w|Tirgan}}|fa=تیرگان|fa_rm=Tirgan}} is an ancient Iranian midsummer festival.
